DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Asia. The aim of this trial is to compare the efficacy of postprandial plasma glucose of two treatment regimens in Chinese subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Insulin Aspart in Subjects With Type 1 or Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Type 1 or 2 diabetes for at least 4 weeks Treatment with oral antidiabetic drugs (OADs) and/or insulin for at least 4 weeks HbA1c: 7.513.5% Body Mass Index (BMI): 1835 kg/m2 Treatment with either soluble human insulin or insulin NPH three times daily within 3 months before trial participation History of drug abuse or alcohol dependence
